WorkItem.Description:
Hi Guys,

I'm having a issue with some styling from an outputted file using PHPExcel. I take an initial template excel file that has some conditional formatting in the cells (changes color when an 'x' is in the cell). Then I fill the template using PHPExcel and every thing works fine except.....

That I can no longer center the text of the cells that have been filled by phpexcel. The original cells were centered but no the text remains left aligned no mater what I do (see yellow cell in the attached file). 

Also there is a strange issue where a single cell gets two 'x' values (see the red cell)

Any ideas what I could be doing wrong?

Thanks in advance,

Brian
WorkItem.Summary: Strange styling behavior outputted from  PhpExcel

Comments.Message:
Any leads here guys? I am struggling to figure out a solution to this....

Thanks,

kseudo
